about_the_game:
The Iron Curtain has fallen. The era of change has come to Eastern Europe, but does everyone need these changes? The Cold War is coming to an end, and "cradles of the revolution" join the fight for their existence in the system of new world order. But will they be able to stay afloat, while preserving all the achievements and ideals of the revolution?

- Lead the best Korea and put and end to years of confrontation with the South.
- Fidel Castro is waiting for Your help, because Cuba was left an orphan in this cruel world, surrounded by enemies.
- Take the reins of socialist Afghanistan, once and for all ending the Civil war.

This DLC includes:
- Three playable countries: North Korea, Cuba, Afghanistan.
- Lots of new and changed endings.
- New mechanics of interaction between countries.
